title: Setting guild permissions from the API

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: You can reach me at lawton@arena.net (or via forum PM), but I prefer communicating API stuff via the forums or on Github to reduce duplication (e.g., other people likely have the same questions/concerns). It’s easier when everything’s in the public.

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body:
Dra Keln.2015:

I believe its been stated that there will never be API’s that allow you to change stuff server side.

Pretty much this.

It’s mostly for technical reasons, TBH. The APIs really just aren’t designed to be able to write data — we’d have to do some rearchitecting to make it not set the world on fire (and there’s too many other more important things in the backlog to bother).

comments.author: Dra Keln.2015
comments.body: I believe its been stated that there will never be API’s that allow you to change stuff server side.

comments.author: Nightlark.4029
comments.body: At the moment, all of the APIs are read-only, an API that lets you change something like permissions is a pretty big change. Would be interesting, but unlikely to happen soon.
